alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; North Bay Interior Valleys; Northern Monterey Bay; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; San Francisco; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 15 at 1:13AM PDT until October 15 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Along the coastline from Sonoma County down to Big Sur, the interior North Bay valleys including Santa Rosa, the San Francisco Peninsula, the Monterey Bay region, the northern Salinas Valley, and Hollister Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy to areas of dense fog are being reported early this morning. Visibilities less than a quarter mile are possible through the late morning today.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; North Bay Interior Valleys; Northern Monterey Bay; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; San Francisco; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast
